trans-unit.target: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·76 | Twilight's Call | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may cast CARDNAME any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it.
trans-unit.target: You may cast CARDNAME any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it.

trans-unit.resname: DDJ·76 | Twilight's Call | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
trans-unit.target: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

trans-unit.source: Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
